name: Deep Clean
description:
Welcome to Deep Clean - an arcade game for SeaJam inspired by Depth Charge.

Use your boat's fishing nets to remove plastic bags from the sea. Be careful though, as plastic pollution bubbles will hurt the dolphin following your boat.

Controls:

Left Arrow:    Move Left.

Right Arrow:   Move Right.

Space:    Drop Net.

Pause / Break:    Pause Game.

Enjoying Deep Clean? Go and support TeamSeas at teamseas.org.
